title: Activity-Centered E-Learning Course Design Collaboration Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Hands-On Workshop for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers to Strengthen Competencies in Designing Science e-Learning Content. Applies Activity Theory-Based Collaboration in Scenarios Mimicking Real Educational Settings

learning_goals: Execute e-Learning course design processes step-by-step by applying Activity-Oriented Design Methodology (AODM)
Analyze collaboration scenarios among diverse stakeholders (teachers-students-technical support teams) and derive three or more improvement strategies
Design and implement at least five interactive elements (quizzes, discussion boards, simulations) for science education content in a Learning Management System (LMS).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
